mapper.insert: insert into offer(OfferNum, Title, Qualification, OfferDate, CompanyName, CompanyId, Detail, EmploymentSector, Task, WorkingArea,Recruitment, Salary) values(( SELECT NVL(MAX(offerNum), 0) + 1 as offerNum FROM offer), #{title}, #{qualification}, #{offerDate}, #{companyName}, #{companyID}, #{detail}, #{employmentSector}, #{task}, #{workingArea}, #{recruitment}, #{salary} )
mapper.select: select OfferNum, title, viewCnt, companyID, companyName, offerDate, qualification, employmentSector, workingArea, salary, recruitment, task, detail from Offer where OfferNum = #{offerNum}
